name: A Train from Baclaran
description:
You're on your usual commute from work...  Summary

A horror puzzle visual novel developed by Undead Engine. 

Team

Aljo San Pedro : Lead, Code

Renee Garin : Dialogue & Narrative, Puzzles

Jala Habal : Background & Items Art

Micha Olalia : Character Art, Voice

Jet Ong : Music & Sound, UI

Credits

Submission for DevelUP Halloween Game Jam 2223A

Made with Ren'Py Engine
